prompt:
A warm sunset bathes the city of Kolkata in golden light as you stroll down a crowded market street. Suddenly, a man stumbles into you, pushing a crumpled note hastily into your hand before hurrying away. As you unfold the note, your blood freezes. It reads; "They're watching. They know. Meet me at the Howrah Bridge at midnight."

1) Go directly to Howrah Bridge to scope the area out.
2) Check into a local hotel for the night and wait until closer to midnight.
3) Visit the police with the mysterious note.
4) Seek help from a local contact you trust.
